signal.title: The Projector
signal.content: A finger pointing at a shadow that reveals itself to be a mirror. 'Every judgment is a map to your own shadow.'

academy.title: The Ego's Defense
academy.content: The Ego quarantines traits it fears in itself by spotting them in others. You judge 'selfishness' because you are fighting your own need to take.

guild.title: The Walmart Watch
steps: Catch your first judgment of a stranger.
Ask: 'Where does this trait live in me?'

nexus.title: Brain Dumps 2: Page 67
nexus.quote: You don't reveal God; you reveal Yourself. Removing the ego reveals the real You connected to all creation.
